quote: A few bad chapters do not mean your story is over.
A little progress each day adds up to big results!
Always end your day with a Positive Thought. No matter how things are, tomorrow is another chance to make things better.
Ask yourself if what you’re doing today is getting you closer to where you want to be tomorrow.
Difficulties in your life don’t come to destroy you, but to help you to realize your hidden potential.
Do everything with a good heart and expect nothing in return and you will never be disappointed.
Don’t ever think that you are nothing. Somewhere along the line, there is going to be someone who thinks you are everything.
The tongue has no bones, but it is strong enough to break a heart. So be careful with your words.
You can add dynamic content in thoughts.json
